promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple spider grass-type pokemon with a regal crystal core. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or spider. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Arachrysolite, a a chibi cute simple spider grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Leaf Bind, Dragon Break. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "spider", "grass" or "Arachrysolite". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, spider-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This sprightly forest dwelling creature elegantly weaves leafy snares. With a Dragon Break, Arachrysolite rules its woody kingdom fearlessly.
